TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WindowStartupLocation extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the position that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window"> will be shown in when it is first opened. Used by the <xref:System.Windows.Window.WindowStartupLocation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.WindowStartupLocation CenterOwner = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The startup location of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window"> is the center of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window"> that owns it, as specified by the P:System.Windows.Window.Owner?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=True property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.WindowStartupLocation CenterScreen = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The startup location of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window"> is the center of the screen that contains the mouse cursor.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.WindowStartupLocation Manual = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The startup location of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window"> is set from code, or defers to the default [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mswin](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-mswin-md.md)] location.
